headline: Buy, Hold, or Fade the Recent Rally in UnitedHealth Group (UNH) Stock?
summary: UnitedHealth Group (UNH) stock is still down 40% YTD but has surged more than +20% this month following reports that Warren Buffett, and other billionaire hedge fund managers have taken a stake in the company.

headline: Can Domestic Assets Continue to Drive Long-Term Growth for Occidental?

headline: Morgan Stanley turns more defensive on oil E&Ps, downgrades OXY, OVV, NOG
summary: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley has shifted to a more defensive stance on oil exploration and production companies following second-quarter results, downgrading Occidental Petroleum (NYSE:OXY), Ovintiv (NYSE:OVV) to Equal-Weight from Overweight and Northern Oil & Gas to Underweight from Equal-Weight.
